header.question: What is the truck serial number?
What is the inspection employee ID?
What is the date of inspection?
What is the time of inspection?
Where is the location of the inspection?
What are the geo coordinates of the inspection?
What are the service meter hours?
What is the customer or company name?
What is the CAT customer ID?

Tracks.question: What is the track tension for the left side?
What is the track tension for the right side?
What is the track condition for the left side? (Good, OK, Needs Replacement)
What is the track condition for the right side? (Good, OK, Needs Replacement)
What is the overall track summary? (<1000 characters)

battery.question: What is the battery replacement date?
What is the battery water level?
Is there any damage to the battery?
Is there any leak or rust in the battery?
What is the battery overall summary?

exterior.question: Is there any rust, dent, or damage to the exterior?
Is there an oil leak in the suspension?
What is the overall summary for the exterior?

brakes.question: What is the brake fluid level?
What is the brake condition for the front?
What is the brake condition for the rear?
What is the condition of the emergency brake?
What is the overall brake summary?

engine.question: Is there any rust, dent, or damage to the engine?
What is the engine oil condition?
What is the engine oil color?
What is the brake fluid condition?
What is the brake fluid color?
Is there any oil leak in the engine?
What is the overall engine summary?

voice Of Customer.question: What feedback did the customer provide?
Insert  images  related to the issues discussed with the customer:
